post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Toronto Area - Mississauga, Ontario, Canada
The Integrated Technology Management Services Business Unit located in Mississauga is actively recruiting for an Analyst - Oracle DBA at the intermediate to senior level to join their team.

Job responsibilities would include:

- installation, upgrades and daily maintenance of the database servers
- maintain and monitor a set of standard database processes to ensure the regular database tasks are properly executed
- carry out perforamance tuning to leverage the RDBMS capabilities
- implement and monitor database security
- perform database backup and recovery
- participate or lead in the database capacity planning and the server upgrade process
- work with database vendors to resolve database related issues.

The successful candidate will possess a minimum of 5 years experience with hands on Oracle Database Administration in a UNIX environment.

Excellent understanding of the Outsourcing Services market in Canada and Globally would be preferred.

You must have exceptional communication skills (listening, written and oral). You are extremely motivated, well organized and resourceful.

You must possess an extremely high comfort level dealing with clients and understanding of the client/service provider relationship.

You must be able to travel to other CGI sites within the GTA.

In this role, you will be required to carry a shared on call duty pager for after hours support.

CGI is the fourth largest independent information technology services firm in North America providing end-to-end IT services and business solutions to more than 3,000 clients worldwide. CGI provides a full range of IT services, including consulting, systems integration, and the management of business and IT functions.

This is a great opportunity to join a winning team. CGI offers a competitive compensation package with opportunities for growth and professional development. Benefits for this position start day one and include 3 weeks vacation, profit sharing and a stock purchase plan. We are an equal opportunity employer.

We wish to thank all applicants for their interest and effort in applying for this position; however, only candidates selected for interviews will be contacted.

No unsolicited agency referrals please. (MR)


Must Have Skills

Working knowledge of Oracle Database Administration in a UNIX environment
Working knowledge of Oracle Database Administration in an Oracle Financial/Peoplesoft environment
Nice to Have Skills
Hands on working knowledge of AIX Operating System
Hands on working knowledge of Shell scripting
post.title: Analyst - Oracle DBA - Intermediate
